MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY23 and SY24 areas of Aberystwyth affecting properties in Clarach, Borth and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 9:45am. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to broken equipment on the overhead lines and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:03pm on 12th February 2021.
